special_text:
[+1]: Tap target permanent. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
[0]: Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a loyalty counter on target planeswalker you control.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.”
